text: Péter Székely (1955–2003) was a Hungarian chess Grandmaster. In the 2003 Capablanca Memorial tournament he drew all 13 of his games, the shortest in 8 moves and the longest in 13 for a total of 130 moves played. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1955 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Hungarian chess players Category:20th-century chess players
title: Péter Székely
